page.title: 08MY SCHOOL DAY HIGH ERCALL
page.content: { My alarm bleeps at 6:10am. I get up to switch the television on for Breakfast T.V before washing and dressing for school. After that I make my breakfast which consists of "Shredded Wheat" and a slice of toast. I watch Breakfast T.V for a few minutes before packing my bags for school. After I have cleaned my teeth I set off for school at 9:10am. School starts at 9:15am. In the morning we work at Maths or English. At 10:45am we have a break which lasts for 15 minutes,then after break we work at a different subject. Lunch is at 12:15pm. During the afternoon we do Topic Work and Physical Education or Games. School ends at 3:30pm. At 7:00pm we travel to Shrewsbury for an organ lesson which lasts for 60 minutes. By Tim Shrosbree.
